Row.Text: Our people have abandoned their past and are now only reading your little red book. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.

One day, wars shall be fought in the open market, and for this day we must prepare. Let us patronise those industrial businesses that would no doubt propel Japan into well economic prosperity and modernity.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Japan (Meiji) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Industrialization [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Factories yield +1 and +15% [ICON_GOLD] Gold

One day, wars shall be fought in the open market, and for this day we must prepare. Let us patronise those industrial businesses that would no doubt propel Japan into well economic prosperity and modernity.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Factories yield +1 and +15% [ICON_GOLD] Gold

The system by which the Daimyo of this nation hold onto authority is an affront to our imperial grace. Their powers must be devolved and restored to the imperial throne for the good of Japan.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Japan (Meiji) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 3 Daimyo [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Industrialization [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All current Daimyo are expended for a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age. Daimyo expended at this time claim nearby tiles and grant [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each tile already claimed

The system by which the Daimyo of this nation hold onto authority is an affront to our imperial grace. Their powers must be devolved and restored to the imperial throne for the good of Japan.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Japan (Meiji) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PRESTIGE] Prestige [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 3 Daimyo [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Industrialization [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All current Daimyo are expended for a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age. Daimyo expended at this time claim nearby tiles and grant [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each tile already claimed

The system by which the Daimyo of this nation hold onto authority is an affront to our imperial grace. Their powers must be devolved and restored to the imperial throne for the good of Japan.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All current Daimyo are expended for a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age. Daimyo expended at this time claim nearby tiles and grant [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each tile already claimed.

Our people clamour to hear your words, great Leader. We must distribute them physically that they might read your words and be inspired.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the PRC [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have created a Great Work [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per Era [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Golden_Age} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost is dependent on your current number of Cities [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points is dependent on how many Great Works you have in the Empire.

Our people clamour to hear your words, great Leader. We must distribute them physically that they might read your words and be inspired.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Golden_Age} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points
The leader of the People's Republic of China has codified his thoughts into a book for the world to read!
Order the construction of Backyard Furnaces

Our steel output is not what it should be. It would be greatly improved if the people had a part in its production. Let us construct backyard furnaces for this purpose.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the PRC [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have researched Electricity [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]3 copies of Iron [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per Game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Farms and Plantations yield +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Improved [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron resources yield +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive 2 free [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINIUM] Aluminium in the capital

Our steel output is not what it should be. It would be greatly improved if the people had a part in its production. Let us construct backyard furnaces for this purpose.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Farms and Plantations yield +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Improved [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron resources yield +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive 2 free [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINIUM] Aluminium in the capital
Write World Event Notification text here.
The people of China are clamoring for more freedom of thought. How should we respond to this??
We don't want them to think. Focus elsewhere.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT][ICON_GOLD]Double [ICON_HAPPINESS_3]Unhappiness from number of Cities for {1_turns} turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Specialist yields +1 of every yield (except for Faith) for {2_turns} turns[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+10% [ICON_FOOD] Growth in all cities for the next {1_turns} turns[ENDCOLOR]
Encouraging free thought has resulted in increased specialist yield for the next {1_turns} turns, but at the same time increased unhappiness from the number of cities within the empire.
Ignoring the clamoring for more freedom of thought has allowed us to focus elsewhere, resulting in increased growth in all cities for the next {1_turns} turns.
In the People's Republic of China, freedom of thought has been encouraged through the Hundred Flowers Campaign.
In the People's Republic of China, the population's cry for freedom of thought has been ignored.

The Four Pests Campaign set in motion to eliminate rats, mosquitoes, sparrows, and flies has has some unfortunate consequences. Sparrows are one of the main predators of crop eating insects, so eliminating them allowed the insects to reproduce a lot, which has crippled our food production empire-wide.
The people of the PRC can easily withstand both hunger and pestilence.
Spend what resources we have to circumvent these unfortunate changes.
An empire-wide hunger has struck for {1_turns} turns.
Despite our efforts, an empire-wide hunger has struck for {1_turns}.
In the People's Republic of China, the Four Pests Campaign has backfired causing empire-wide hunger.
In the People's Republic of China, the Four Pests Campaign has backfired causing empire-wide hunger.
